item.title: (Linux) Debug Shell Scripts
item.description: Debug Shell Scripts In my experience, people when they want to debug a shell script, they usually use the set +xv and all this does is print each operation on the console output. I found a better way to debug the shell script, which is consistent with going over each line on the press of the enter key Simply add the below line in front of the place from where you want to start the debug
